title: 2019 PUNJAB PARLIAMENT ELECTIONS
desc:
Party wise seats
nopartySeatscolor
1INC8
2BJP2
3SAD2
4AAAP1
The 2019 Indian general election in Punjab was held on 19 May 2019,making it seventh and the last phase of the election. Counting was held on 23 May 2019 and result was also declared on same day.

1.matter:
AC NAME: Gurdaspur
AC NO: 1
WINNER: SUNNY DEOL
WON BY: BJP
RUNNER: SUNIL JAKHAR
LOST BY: INC
margin: 82459
